body:
Look at the http/fcgi code this is exactly what is done there. FYI xinetd
send the socket connection to the child process via stdin.

On Wed, Sep 16, 2015 at 8:34 AM, Brad Fitzpatrick <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> is a listener. I bet it's just the first and only connection.
